Reference

Lexicons

lexicon_afinn()

AFINN-111 dataset

lexicon_bing()

Bing sentiment lexicon

lexicon_nrc()

NRC word-emotion association lexicon

lexicon_nrc_eil()

NRC Emotion Intensity Lexicon (aka Affect Intensity Lexicon) v0.5

lexicon_nrc_vad()

The NRC Valence, Arousal, and Dominance Lexicon

lexicon_loughran()

Loughran-McDonald sentiment lexicon

Data Sets

dataset_sentence_polarity()

v1.0 sentence polarity dataset

dataset_ag_news()

AG's News Topic Classification Dataset

dataset_dbpedia()

DBpedia Ontology Dataset

dataset_trec()

TREC dataset

dataset_imdb()

IMDB Large Movie Review Dataset

Embeddings

embedding_glove6b() embedding_glove27b() embedding_glove42b() embedding_glove840b()

Global Vectors for Word Representation

Other

catalogue

Catalogue of all available data sources
